name: HBX Admin Edits a Broker Applicant

elements.name: Primary Broker has not signed up on the HBX

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
all permissions are present
the Plans exist
there is a Broker Agency exists for District Brokers Inc
the broker Max Planck is primary broker for District Brokers Inc
that a user with a HBX staff role with HBX staff subrole exists and is logged in
HBX Admin visits the Edit Broker Applicant page for Max Planck of agency District Brokers Inc

comments.value: # Skipped the steps here due to constant intermittent failures with clicking links

steps.name: HBX Admin edits the broker application and clicks update
the HBX Admin should see a success message that the broker application was successfully updated

name: Broker Manages Employee Account
description:
In order to help Employees with plan shopping, brokers can access their employers employees accounts
  The Broker should be able to do plan shopping for employees

elements.name: Broker registration

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for draft initial employer with health benefits
there is a Broker Agency exists for District Brokers Inc
the broker Max Planck is primary broker for District Brokers Inc
there is an employer ABC Widgets
ABC Widgets employer has a staff role
employer ABC Widgets hired broker Max Planck from District Brokers Inc
initial employer ABC Widgets has enrollment_open benefit application
there is a census employee record for Patrick Doe for employer ABC Widgets

elements.name: Broker manages employer account

steps.name: I go to the employee account creation page
Patrick Doe creates an HBX account
Patrick Doe goes to register as an employee
Patrick Doe should see the employee search page
Employee enter the identifying info of Patrick Doe
Employee should see the matched employee record form
Patrick Doe accepts the matched employer
Employee completes the matched employee form for Patrick Doe
I log out
Max Planck logs on to the Broker Agency Portal
Primary Broker clicks on the Families tab
Primary Broker should see Patrick Doe as family and click on name
Primary Broker should see Patrick Doe account
Primary Broker logs out

comments.value: # Then Primary Broker is on the consumer home page
# Then Primary Broker shops for plans
# Then Primary Broker sees covered family members
# Then Primary Broker should see the list of plans
# Then Primary Broker selects a plan on the plan shopping page
# And Primary Broker clicks on purchase button on the coverage summary page
# And Primary Broker should see the receipt page

name: Broker Manages Employer Account
description:
In order to help Employer, brokers can access their employers accounts
  The Broker should be able to set up application and roster for the employer

elements.name: Broker registration

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for draft initial employer with health benefits
there is a Broker Agency exists for District Brokers Inc
the broker Max Planck is primary broker for District Brokers Inc
there is an employer ABC Widgets
ABC Widgets employer has a staff role
initial employer ABC Widgets has draft benefit application
employer ABC Widgets hired broker Max Planck from District Brokers Inc

elements.name: Broker manages employer account

steps.name: Max Planck logs on to the Broker Agency Portal
Primary Broker clicks on the Employers tab
Primary Broker should see Employer ABC Widgets and click on legal name
Primary should see the Employer ABC Widgets page as Broker
Primary Broker clicks on the Benefits tab
Primary Broker publishes the benefit application
Primary Broker should see a published success message without employee
Primary Broker clicks on the Employees tab
Primary Broker clicks on the add employee button
Primary Broker creates Broker Assisted as a roster employee
Primary Broker sees employer census family created
Primary Broker logs out

name: Broker creates a quote for a prospect employer
description:
In order for Brokers to create a quote to Employers
  The Broker should be able to add Employer and Employees
  And Generate a quote

elements.name: Broker Quoting Tool

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
the Plans exist
there is a Broker Agency exists for District Brokers Inc
the broker Max Planck is primary broker for District Brokers Inc

elements.name: Broker should be able to create an Employer

steps.name: Max Planck logs on to the Broker Agency Portal
Primary Broker clicks on the Employers tab
Primary Broker clicks on the Add Prospect Employer button
Primary Broker creates new Prospect Employer with default_office_location
Primary Broker should see successful message
the broker clicks Actions dropdown and clicks View Quotes from dropdown menu
Primary Broker should be on the Roster page of a View quote
Primary Broker should see the quote roster is empty
Primary Broker logs out

elements.name: Broker Quoting Tool

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
the Plans exist
there is a Broker Agency exists for District Brokers Inc
the broker Max Planck is primary broker for District Brokers Inc

elements.name: Roster does not populate even if employer has prior quotes with rosters completed

steps.name: Max Planck logs on to the Broker Agency Portal
Primary Broker clicks on the Employers tab
Primary Broker clicks on the Add Prospect Employer button
Primary Broker creates new Prospect Employer with default_office_location
Primary Broker should see successful message
the broker clicks Actions dropdown and clicks Create Quote from dropdown menu
Primary Broker should be on the Roster page of a Create quote
Primary Broker enters quote name
the broker clicks on Select Health Benefits button
the broker selects plan offerings by metal level and enters 100 for employee and deps
broker publishes the quote

Primary Broker should see the quote roster is empty
Primary Broker logs out

Hbx Admin clicks on the current broker applicant show button

Hbx Admin click approve broker button
Hbx Admin should see the broker successfully approved message
Hbx Admin logs out

Primary Broker visits invitation url in email
Primary Broker should see the create account page
Primary Broker registers with valid information
they should see a welcome message
Primary Broker logs out

And Primary Broker enters broker agency information for SHOP markets

benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open renewal employer with health benefits
there is an employer Acme Inc.
renewal employer Acme Inc. has active and renewal enrollment_open benefit applications
there is a census employee record and employee role for Ricky Martin for employer Acme Inc.

comments.value: # And Acme Inc. employer has a staff role

steps.name: census employee Ricky Martin is a newly_designated_eligible employee
this employer Acme Inc. has first_of_month rule
employee Ricky Martin already matched with employer Acme Inc. and logged into employee portal
Employee should click on Manage Family button
Employee should click on the Personal Tab link
Employee should not see phone main field in the personal information fields
Employee Ricky Martin should only have phone with work kind

name: Create Primary Broker and Broker Agency
description:
In order for Brokers to help SHOP employees only
  The Primary Broker must create and manage an account on the HBX for their organization.
  Such organizations are referred to as a Broker Agency
  The Primary Broker should be able to create a Broker Agency account application
  The HBX Admin should be able to approve the application and send an email invite
  The Primary Broker should receive the invite and create an Account
  The Employer should be able to select the Primary Broker as their Broker
  The Broker should be able to manage that Employer
  The Broker should be able to select a family covered by that Employer
  The Broker should be able to purchase insurance for that family

elements.name: Broker can enter ACH information

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
there is an employer ABC Widgets
Primary Broker visits the HBX Broker Registration form
a valid ach record exists
Primary Broker has not signed up as an HBX user
Primary Broker should see the New Broker Agency form
Primary Broker enters personal information
Primary Broker enters broker agency information for SHOP markets
Primary Broker enters office location for default_office_location
Primary Broker should see broker registration successful message

name: Assign Broker Agency Staff to Broker Agency

elements.name: Broker Staff has not signed up on the HBX

steps.name: there is a Broker Agency exists for District Brokers Inc
all permissions are present
the broker Max Planck is primary broker for District Brokers Inc
Broker Staff visits the HBX Broker Registration form
Broker Staff has not signed up as an HBX user
Broker Staff should see the Broker Staff Registration form
Broker staff enters his personal information
Broker staff searches for Broker Agency which exists in EA
Broker staff should see a list of Broker Agencies searched and selects his agency
Broker staff submits his application and see successful message
Max Planck logs on to the Broker Agency Portal
there is a Staff with a pending broker staff role in the table
the Broker clicks on the approve button
Broker should see the staff successfully approved message
Broker logs out
Broker Staff should receive an invitation email from his Employer
Broker Staff visits invitation url in email
Broker Staff should see the create account page
Broker Staff registers with valid information
Broker Staff should see successful message with broker agency home page
Broker Staff logs out
Max Planck logs on to the Broker Agency Portal
the Broker removes Broker staff from Broker staff table
Broker should see the staff successfully removed message
Broker logs out

elements.name: Adding Existing person as Broker Staff to Broker Agency

steps.name: there is a Broker Agency exists for District Brokers Inc
the broker Max Planck is primary broker for District Brokers Inc
person record exists for John Doe
Max Planck logs on to the Broker Agency Portal
the Broker clicks on the Add Broker Staff Role button
a form appears that requires the Broker to input First Name, Last Name, and DOB to submit
the Broker enters the First Name, Last Name, and DOB of existing user John Doe
the Broker will be given a broker staff role with the given Broker Agency
the Broker will now appear within the Broker Staff table as Active and Linked

elements.name: Adding Non Existing person as Broker Staff to Broker Agency

steps.name: there is a Broker Agency exists for District Brokers Inc
the broker Max Planck is primary broker for District Brokers Inc
Max Planck logs on to the Broker Agency Portal
the Broker clicks on the Add Broker Staff Role button
a form appears that requires the Broker to input First Name, Last Name, and DOB to submit
the Broker enters the First Name, Last Name, and DOB of an non existing user in EA
the Broker will not be given a broker staff role with the given Broker Agency

name: Create General Agency and General Agency Staff Role

elements.name: A General Agency Submits Application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
a general agency agent visits the DCHBX
they click the 'New General Agency' button
they should see the new general agency form
they complete the new general agency form and hit the 'Submit' button
they should see a confirmation message
a pending approval status

elements.name: A General Agency is Approved

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
that a user with a HBX staff role with HBX Staff subrole exists and is logged in
a general agency, pending approval, exists
Hbx Admin is on Broker Index of the Admin Dashboard
Hbx Admin is on Broker Index and clicks General Agencies
they should see the pending general agency
they click the link of general agency
they should see the home of general agency
they visit the list of staff
they should see the name of staff
they approve the general agency
they should see updated status
the general agency should receive an email

elements.name: A General Agency Creates an Account

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
a general agency, approved, awaiting account creation, exists
the HBX admin visits the link received in the approval email
they should see an account creation form
they complete the account creation form and hit the 'Submit' button
they should see a welcome message
they see the General Agency homepage
General Agency Staff logs out

name: Employer terminates borker and hires new broker
description:
In order for Employer to restrict Broker access to his account
  The Employer should be able to fire previously selected broker
